description: I haven't run a backup on my system for 43 days. Why? Because Crashplan service quits and doesn't notify. When I try to run it manually it cannot connect to it's background service. I start the service it stops. I uninstall crashplan and reinstall it. It works. Seems everytime there is an update it stops working. Horrible and unrreliable is not what one wants in a backup client!

This app can kill vpn by network overload.
Applying limits in app does not not.
La app me consumía mucha red en segundo plano y se ejecutaba de forma automatica lo que hacía que subiera mi ping y no me permití trabajar correctamente
Worst app it's slowing down all the apps.it's consuming lot of data.
This makes my laptop very slow. The network usage by this application looks more and it effects my day to day activities.
